GET /api/word/daily.description: Returns a 5 letter word, which will be randomised each day

POST /api/word/daily.description: Receives a 5 letter word and returns an array indicating, for each letter, whether it exists and/or is in the correct position in the daily word

GET /api/wordIds.description: Returns an array of random wordIds, and can take a quantity (q) query to determine the number of wordIds to be given, up to a maximum of 10

GET /api/word/:wordId.description: Returns a 5 letter word for the given wordId

POST /api/word/:wordId.description: Receives a 5 letter word and returns an array indicating, for each letter, whether it exists and/or is in the correct position in the target word from the given wordId
